name: haml-hero
description: Comprehensive syntax highlighting for HAML, including multi-line, code blocks, and complex indentation.

hamlHero.enableDiagnostics.description: Enable real-time linting diagnostics (warnings and errors) from haml-lint

hamlHero.enableFormatting.description: Enable formatting with haml-lint (make sure formatOnSave is enabled in editor settings for haml files)

enumDescriptions: Apply all auto-corrections, including potentially unsafe ones (--auto-correct-all)
hamlHero.formatterMode.description: Determines which auto-corrections to apply when formatting

hamlHero.additionalLinterArguments.description: Additional arguments to pass to haml-lint when running diagnostics

hamlHero.additionalFormatterArguments.description: Additional arguments to pass to haml-lint when formatting

hamlHero.configPath.description: Path to a custom .haml-lint.yml config file. If not specified, will check workspace root, then use extension default. Supports ~ for home directory and relative paths from workspace root.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
